product_name: White Sierra Bridge Trail Shirt Jacket - Men's - Special Buy
long_description: A fleece-lined shirt with the fit of a roomy jacket, the men's White Sierra Bridge Trail shirt jacket combines casual looks with light warmth for hanging out around the cabin or campsite. Polyester fleece lining offers light warmth against your body, and cotton twill exterior has been sand- and silicone-washed for extra softness. The men's White Sierra Bridge Trail shirt jacket features 2 chest pockets; oversized fit. Special buy.
